parameters.name: DIJobId
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use the Id parameter instead.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the synchronization task.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description:
The DataWorks workspace ID. You can log on to the [DataWorks console](https://workbench.data.aliyun.com/console) and go to the Workspace page to query the ID.

You must configure this parameter to specify the DataWorks workspace to which the API operation is applied.

parameters.name: WithDetails
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return detailed configuration information, including TransformationRules, TableMappings, and JobSettings. Valid values: true and false. Default value: true.
